Name: Zoning, 1946 East 7th Street Rezoning, Brooklyn (N 240253 ZRK).
Title: Application number N 240253 ZRK (1946 East 7th Street Rezoning) submitted by Ahi Ezer Expansion Fund Inc, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, amending Article XI, Chapter 3 (Special Ocean Parkway District) and APPENDIX F (Inclusionary Housing Designated Areas and Mandatory Inclusionary Housing Areas) for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 15, Council District 44.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises
